items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly in one-on-one and group chats.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Unread messages are marked until viewed by the recipient
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-on-one video calls with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams start within 3 seconds of call acceptance
Call quality adapts to network conditions without dropping the connection
dependencies: WebRTC or equivalent video streaming service
non_functional: Video resolution adjusts dynamically based on bandwidth
End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed that the application will support both one-on-one and group text chats, but video calling is limited to one-on-one unless specified otherwise.
